title: Death
description: Sadness looms over the old mansion at the end of the road where the massive oaks and willows line the street.With no one recovering from the losses they have experienced and D-Day creeping up on them, Ari decides to make a final push. Only this time she has a little help from O. Between the strongest magic in the world and the control Ari has learned, they hope they will be able to manipulate the time change and make everything better with a single push.There is one thing they don't account for, Angels. Angels and the gifts they bestow upon us change us. Sometimes permanently.
author: T.L.   Brown
